title: Trauma Patient

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, visit a dead player in the graveyard. You will remember their role, becoming it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can remember Cleaned roles.
- If you attempt to remember a disguised body's role, you will be informed that your ability failed.
- If a Town Power is dead, you must remember it at night. You may not idle or remember anyone else.
 - If multiple players attempt to become a Town Power role at night, only one random player will become it.
- *__Made for the Curated role list - Rebalanced from Town of Salem 2 Amnesiac__*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang those who oppose the town.

desc:
Post 5177
*"Seeing that corpse made me remember it all. It was buried so far down."*
